name: 楊韻華
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2-4 Overnight Fame / Taipei Tech ESP 
Week 5-7 Eating Properly  / Taipei Tech ESP 
Week 7-9 Western vs. Eastern Education  / Taipei Tech ESP 
Week 10-12 Sports Mania  / Taipei Tech ESP 
Week 13-15 The Pros and Cons of Being Connected  / Taipei Tech ESP 
Week 16-17 Innovation Entrepreneurs  / Taipei Tech ESP
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Two grading categories 
(A) Attendance 30% (10% deduction penalty for each absence)
      In-class presentation (units of Taipei Tech ESP series) 15%
      In-class quizzes (TOEIC format) 15%
      Midterm and Final 30% 
      Learning Portfolio 10% 
(B) University Joint Exams 30% 
Semeters Grade / points out of 100 = (A) x70% + (B) x 100%
materials:
New Connection 4 (All students need to use copyrighted materials; photocopied materials are not allowed.)
Taipei Tech ESP series for College of Design and Colleg of Humanities and Social Studies
